# 深度学习与交通大数据实战V1.0版

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shendu-xuexi-yu-jiaotong-da-shuju-shizhan-v1-0-ban
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shendu-xuexi-yu-jiaotong-da-shuju-shizhan-v1-0-ban
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shendu-xuexi-yu-jiaotong-da-shuju-shizhan-v1-0-ban
shendu-xuexi-yu-jiaotong-da-shuju-shizhan-v1-0-ban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shendu-xuexi-yu-jiaotong-da-shuju-shizhan-v1-0-ban
shendu-xuexi-yu-jiaotong-da-shuju-shizhan-v1-0-ban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
